participant_1.background:
My parents are my heroes.
I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor.
I wake up and check my phone for messages from potential dates.
I live alone and cook for myself.
I still enjoy my meat but have become a responsible adult.

participant_2.background:
I can work from home and still make enough money to provide for my family.
I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal.
my parents own a business that i am now running.
My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
I work as a park ranger, which allows me to spend my days surrounded by nature.

content.text: It's going pretty well! I'm excited to go to work and see my girlfriend after.
That's great to hear! I'm working from home today, which I love because it gives me a lot of freedom.
That's really awesome! I wish I could work from home. I'm actually a park ranger, so I get to spend my days surrounded by nature.
That sounds like an amazing job! I love being outdoors. What's your favorite part about it?
My favorite part is getting to interact with people from all walks of life. I also love learning about new species of animals and plants.
That's really cool! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! What do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer. I love working on new projects and learning new things.
That's really cool! I'm not very good with computers.
No worries! Everyone has their strengths and weaknesses.
Thanks! I like that about you. You're so positive.
I'm glad. You seem like a really great person.
